title: Best Buy laptop deals: Dell Inspiron, HP Chromebook and Lenovo Yoga up to $200 off this weekend
author: tabitha-baker
summary: But move quickly - these offers end this weekend
article: Best Buy has launched a quickfire three day sale, and if you're in the market for a new PC you'll want to take a look at the latest laptop deals before it's too late.

You'll find up to $200 has been stripped away from the prices of some of the more powerful machines, but cheap Chromebooks are also lining the shelves this weekend as well. The 2-in-1 HP Chromebook 14, for example, is down to just $319 right now - an excellent price for a convertible laptop usually sat around $400.

However, these laptop deals really start to shine once you get into the bigger rigs. This weekend's standout offer has to be the Dell Inspiron 13 7000. Another 2-in-1 laptop, you're getting the very latest 11th generation of Intel's processing power, a 512GB SSD and 32GB of Intel Optane memory in a slick chassis - all for just $699 (was $899). That's an incredible offer, especially if you're after both power and portability.
You'll find our top picks of Best Buy's laptop deals just below, or take a look at the full sale for yourself.
Not in the US? You'll find more laptop deals on these models further down the page.

You'll find plenty more Chromebook deals available right now if you're looking for more cheap computing options, however if that Dell Inspiron had you intrigued you can also take a look at the latest Dell laptop deals as well. Of course, if you're looking for that Apple luxury, we're also rounding up the best cheap MacBook deals on the web right now.
